skillTree.localised_description: A skeletal warhorse fashioned in the cathayan aesthetic; a favored mount by the equally macabre jade-blooded vampires.

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates when within 60 metres of a Yang unit.
Effect intensity increases by highest nearby Harmony multiplier on a unit.

skillTree.localised_description: A great jade longma raised unto undeath; its trampling hooves and draconian wings imbued with necrotic magic.

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates when within 60 metres of a Yang unit.
Effect intensity increases by highest nearby Harmony multiplier on a unit.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.
The feared Jiangshi are the mindless thralls of the Jade-Blooded Vampires. Their inhuman resilience and supernatural strength makes them the ideal minions.

effects.description:
Melee defense: +5% for Jiangshi units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Jiangshi units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defense: +8% for Jiangshi units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."
"Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.
See the future, change the present.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

skillTree.localised_description: Strike hard, strike true.
The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The necromancer recites from forbidden scrolls an ancient rite used to trap and bind wandering spirits into a chosen corpse, thereby enslaving the creature in undeath.

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Xiaolan's Spirit Seal"

ui_effects.localised_text: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

skillTree.localised_description: The victim's ancestors erupt from their ancient graves, sapping away their bravado with thoughts of guilt and despair as they get dragged into the afterlife.

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Ancestral Haunt"
Winds of magic cost: -3 to "Ancestral Haunt Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Although renowned for miraculous life magicks, mystical Weng-Chang was also home to a darker manipulation of the jade winds.

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Curse of Weng-Chang"
Winds of magic cost: -3 to "Curse of Weng-Chang Upgraded"
Effect range: +10 to "Curse of Weng-Chang Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A rusty bell is rang and hateful spirits of the dead are roused from the underworld, clawing and howling, upon the mortal realm.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Spell number of uses: +1 for "Call From the Beyond" and "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Range: +50% to "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Outstretching both gnarled hands, the jade-blooded vampire drains its victim's spirit, leaving an empty, withered husk.

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Soul Vampirism"
Winds of magic cost: -3 to "Soul Vampirism Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A small rift to the afterlife is opened by the sorceror, drawing forth the attention of powerful spirits that reside within.

effects.description: Spell number of uses: +1 for "Gate of the Spirit Realm"
Cooldown: -30% to "Gate of the Spirit Realm"
Spell number of uses: +2 for "Gate of the Spirit Realm"
Cooldown: -50% to "Gate of the Spirit Realm"
Winds of magic cost: -3 to "Gate of the Spirit Realm"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: "Forces of Necromancy, hear the request of your most-studious adept: flow through me according to my will!"
"I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: "A wall of decaying flesh and bone slowly advanced towards us, implacable and utterly remorseless."

effects.description:
Melee defense: +4 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units

Melee defense: +8 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: All manners of bogeys and fiends that lurk in the dark wood, idling patiently as the sun sets into the horizon -- and the night begins.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Infantry: +5 for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: In the East, tales of ghosts are often brought up to scare and discipline children or spread around as petty entertainment, but in crumbling abodes and forgotten clanhouses, lingering spirits exist, languishing in murderous rage.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +15% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +4% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +20% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Cathayan underworld is home to many immetarial creatures, and some of these aren't as benevolent as Cathay's venerated ancestors.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +6% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +8% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +10% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Charge, brothers! We are sworn-comrades in life, and now, in DEATH! For Xen Yang! For the Dragon Emperor!"

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Grandy Cathay is home to many supernatural abominations that stalk the night and maliciously feast upon the populace's nightmares.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units

Speed: +10% for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +11 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The endurance of boogeymen and other nightly frights that haunt the Cathayan psyche is perhaps one of the more intriguing aspects of their culture.

effects.description:
Armour +8 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, Revenants, Blood Lions and Jiangshi units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +10% for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, Revenants, Blood Lions and Jiangshi units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Not only satisfied in enacting revenge, some spirits go as far as to inflict misery and torment upon the living out of misplaced wrath and perceived injustices.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +7 for Spirit host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui, Pale Lady, and Underworld Gate Guardian units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spirit host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui, Pale Lady, and Underworld Gate Guardian units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: At sunset, when all the windows are barred and the crows have cawwed, the dread denizens of the night encroach upon the world of mortals from the shadows.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Fell bats, Gore Hags, Mogwai, Devil of Dark Omen and Yaoguai (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Fell bats, Gore Hags, Mogwai, Devil of Dark Omen and Yaoguai (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Deathless horses with eyes that burn like brimstone and hooves that leave trails of ghostflame; the jade banner flashes its accursed colors.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: +15% for Youxia revenants and Cursed Jade Carriage units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Youxia revenants and Cursed Jade Carriage units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.
Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

effects.description: The Dead Rise Again: +5% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle
The Dead Rise Again: +10% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle
The Dead Rise Again: +15% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle

skillTree.localised_description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

effects.description:
Character experience gain: +10%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +30%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.
W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.
This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Attrition: -10% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Attrition: -15% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord can hear the thoughts of mortals for leagues around, and plan accordingly.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +15
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates when within 60 metres of a Yang unit.
Effect intensity increases by highest nearby Harmony multiplier on a unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."
Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(Heroes in local province)

Hero action success chance: +5%
	(Heroes in local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(own army)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -10% for all spellcasters
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
